name: Birds' Jokes
description: Control is pretty easy. Player goes ahead all time. Press "W" or UpArrow for double speed, "A/D" or horizontal arrows - right and left moving and space is a shoot. You need to shoot a car, if you do this ypu will get 20 points. Now almost nothing in game makes sense because unfortunately i joined to the jam too late and had only one day yo make this game. Anyways, wait your comments , enjoy the game XD
